column2: Granted her first ever summer vacation, this young
column3: noble is filled with joy at the sight of the ocean. Conjurer,
column4: Weakens Traitless and Black, unleashes Mini-Waves.

column2: The dazzling grin on her face is an inspiration to the kids
column3: who cheer her on from the seashore. Conjurer,
column4: Weakens Traitless and Black, unleashes Mini-Waves.
